lanes.name: To Do
lanes.description: Tasks that need to be done.

lanes.name: In Progress
lanes.description: Tasks that are currently being worked on.

lanes.name: Review

lanes.name: Deploy
lanes.description: Tasks that are ready for deployment.

lanes.name: On Hold
lanes.description: Tasks that are on hold or waiting for further action.

lanes.name: Archived
